entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
